short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension designed to enhance focus by allowing only the currently opened tabs and preventing the opening of any new tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FocusGuard - Maximize Your Focus, Minimize Distractions
FocusGuard is a simple yet powerful Chrome extension designed to help you stay focused by limiting your browser activity to only the currently opened tabs. Once activated, FocusGuard prevents any new tabs from being opened, allowing you to concentrate fully on the tasks at hand without the distraction of endless browsing.

Key Features:
Tab Control for Focus: FocusGuard stops you from opening new tabs, keeping your attention on the current task. Perfect for studying, working, or any activity that requires deep focus.

Automatic Blocking: Once activated, FocusGuard automatically blocks all attempts to open new tabs, ensuring that you remain focused without needing to manually intervene.

Simple and Lightweight: FocusGuard is easy to use and doesn’t require any complex setup. Just activate the extension, and it works quietly in the background to keep you on track.

Privacy First: FocusGuard doesn’t track your browsing activity or collect any personal data. Your privacy is fully protected while you use the extension.

Why Use FocusGuard?
In a digital world full of distractions, it’s easy to get sidetracked by opening multiple tabs and losing focus. FocusGuard is your personal productivity tool, helping you maintain concentration by limiting your browser to just the tabs you need. Whether you’re writing, researching, or simply trying to stay on task, FocusGuard ensures that you don’t drift away from your goals.

How to Use:
Install FocusGuard from the Chrome Web Store.
Activate FocusGuard by clicking the extension icon.
Enjoy Distraction-Free Browsing: FocusGuard will now block all new tabs, helping you stay focused and productive.
Get FocusGuard Today
Transform your browsing experience with FocusGuard and take control of your focus. Whether you’re working, studying, or just trying to stay on task, FocusGuard is the perfect tool to help you achieve your goals.
